1.Name: Now, soup
1.Text: Now, we are going to cook a vegetable soup, ask me if you need help!

2.Name: butter
2.Text: Heat the butter in a large pot over medium heat

2.1.Name: Interject
2.1.Text: If you don't have butter, you can use olive oil

2.2.Name: Abrupt
2.2.Text: Replacing butter with olive oil, remembert to lower the heat as the frying temperature is higher for oil

3.Name: Onions
3.Text: Chop the onions and add them to the pot. Season with salt and pepper

3.1.Name: Interject
3.1.Text: Just add a bit of salt, remember that the broth is salty

3.2.Name: Interject
3.2.Text: Chop the onion to one centimeter large pieces

5.Name: add veg
5.Text: Chop and add two garlic cloves, one carrot, two celery sticks, and half a zucchini

5.1.Name: inj
5.1.Text: If you want a sweater soup, add another carrot.

5.2.Name: inj
5.2.Text: You want the vegetables to pick up just a little color.

6.Name: Season and simmer
6.Text: Season with some more salt and pepper and let simmer for 6 minutes, stirring frequently.

7.Name: Add cannellini et al
7.Text: Add the bell pepper, tomatoes, and chili to the pot and let simmer for 3-4 minutes.

7.1.Name: inj
7.1.Text: You want a less spicy soup, remove the seeds from the chili.

8.Name: If thicker
8.Text: For a thicker soup, add cream and let it simmer

8.1.Name: inj
8.1.Text: If you dont have cream, drain and rinse the cannellini beans and then either puree or mash half of them.

8.2.Name: Abrupt
8.2.Text: There are other ways to increase the thickness of a soup, you can can add flour and water, or mashed cannellini beans

9.Name: Broth
9.Text: Pour the broth into the pot and bring to a slow boil.

9.1.Name: inj
9.1.Text: If you dont have prepared broth, you can add add two cups of water and a Bouillon cube.

9.2.Name: Abrupt
9.2.Text: There are other ways to increase the thickness of a soup, you can can add flour and water, or mashed cannellini beans

10.Name: swiss chard
10.Text: Once the broth is slowly bubbling, add the swiss chard.

11.Name: Cook for 15
11.Text: Cover the pot let it cook for 15-20 minutes.

12.Name: End
12.Text: Thank you for cooking with me
